metadata.description: Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/
Temp env var for the missing API version in DoD and GCCH for the Get App as Admin call needed
in the maker table we store a user for system with an id. Storing here so that it can be referenced without having to look it up all the time.

parameters.$filter: _admin_app_value eq '@{triggerBody()['text_2']}' and _admin_connector_value eq '@{items('Delete_each')?['ConnectorID']}' and admin_displayname eq '@{replace(items('Delete_each')?['DisplayName'], '''', '''''')}'

IsOrphan.inputs: @if(or(equals(outputs('OwnerID'), null), equals(length(outputs('OwnerID')), 0), equals(outputs('Get_Maker')?['body/admin_makerisorphaned'], true), equals(outputs('Get_Maker')?['body/admin_makerid'], null)), true, false)

Ensure_Envt_Inventoried.description: This is needed for BYODL case as sometimes objects are in the datalake before the envt

APIVersionToUse.description: VersionToUse - while await for 2023-06-01 to be in GCCH and DoD

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

Catch_-_not_ready_to_take_last_run_date.inputs: Catch - not ready to take last run date
